name: KILL CHILL
description:
KILL CHILL

                                                              A FPS SHOOTER GAME 

GOAL-

                           STAY ALIVE AS LONG AS POSSIBLE

                           YOU WOULD DIE WHEN THE ENEMY TOUCHES YOU

CONTROLS-

                              W, A, S, D  TO MOVE

                              SPACEBAR TO JUMP

                              LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO SCOPE

                              RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON TO SHOOT

                              1, 2, 3, 4  OR  SCROLL TO CHANGE WEAPON

NOTE-

               The game is currently available to download for Windows and Linux users only.

               There will be a Mac version of the game out soon

                However anyone can play the WebGL version of the game on the site
